channel.title: [PI] How do I edit drops? I really need help!
channel.description:
I've edited previous PI sources that have had different drop methods, for example, one had a list of the drops in config.java. However, I haven't been able to find out how to edit the drops in the server I'm currently working on. I've tried editing the NPCDrops.TSM file and it doesn't work. Can anyone help me out? I believe this could be the Soul Split source with some minor edits because I happened to find a line of text that said something about Soul Split's website while I was editing things.
I'd appreciate any help.

item.title: [PI] How do I edit drops? I really need help!
item.dc:creator: @xp_skilz xp skilz
item.description:
@xp_skilz wrote:

if you are the coder there should be in the files at the npc part might be with notes edit them and save them that all i know really

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] How do I edit drops? I really need help!
item.dc:creator: @Kecea Kecea
item.description:
@Kecea wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:7, topic:382050”]NPCDrops.TSM[/quote]Could be, but not every source have it.

You may have changed it, but remember to update the NPCHandler after you change it (I’d recommend restarting the whole server), and it may not drop EVERY kill.

Read full topic
